issue.title: [Java][Vector] Convenience methods for setting decimal vector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4808](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4808). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Provide more convenience methods to set decimal vector, specifically
1. Accept arrow buffers encode in little endian bytes that are of size < 16 bytes
1. Accept arrow buffers that are encoded in big endian and could of size <=16 bytes
